TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SoapUnknownHeader extends System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader
Public NotInheritable Class SoapUnknownHeader Inherits SoapHeader

summary.span: 表示從 SOAP 標頭接收的資料，該資料無法為收件者 XML Web Service 或 XML Web Service 用戶端所辨識。

span.span: Represents the data received from a SOAP header that was not understood by the recipient XML Web service or XML Web service client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SOAP 用戶端可能會叫用 XML Web service 與超出必要的參數，在 SOAP 標頭的表單的其他資料。A SOAP client might invoke an XML Web service with additional data beyond the required parameters in the form of a SOAP header. 使用 ASP.NET 或 XML Web 服務用戶端建立 XML Web 服務可以檢視任何 SOAP 標頭，它不了解在撰寫 XML Web service 時藉由套用與屬性的其中一個陣列， ，或陣列XML Web 服務方法。An XML Web service created using ASP.NET or an XML Web service client can view any SOAP headers it did not know about at the time the XML Web service was written by applying a with a property of either an array of , , or an array of to the XML Web service method. 指定的，可讓 XML Web 服務的形式檢視內容的 SOAP 標頭。Specifying a of , allows the XML Web service to view the contents of the SOAP header in the form of an . ## Examples `MyWebService` XML Web 服務會接受並處理`MyHeader`SOAP 標頭傳送的任何呼叫`MyWebMethod`XML Web service 方法。The `MyWebService` XML Web service accepts and processes the `MyHeader` SOAP header sent with any calls to the `MyWebMethod` XML Web service method. 此外，`MyWebMethod`接收任何 SOAP 標頭以外`MyHeader`SOAP 標頭。Additionally, `MyWebMethod` receives any SOAP headers other than the `MyHeader` SOAP header.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Xml::XmlElement ^ Element { System::Xml::XmlElement ^ get(); void set(System::Xml::XmlElement ^ value); };
member this.Element : System.Xml.XmlElement with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定 SOAP 要求或回應的 XML 標頭項目。

span.span: Gets or sets the XML Header element for a SOAP request or response.

value.span: ，表示 SOAP 標頭的未經處理的 XML。

span.span: An representing the raw XML of the SOAP header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果想要處理 SOAP 標頭，它不知道在 XML Web 服務會撰寫的服務方法的 XML Web，它可以處理類別，代表原始 XML 的 SOAP 標頭。If an XML Web service method wants to process SOAP headers it does not know about at the time the XML Web service is written, it can process an class representing the raw XML of the SOAP header. ## Examples 下列`MyWebService`XML Web 服務會接收所有的 SOAP 標頭，包括以外`MyHeader`它所知道的 SOAP 標頭。The following `MyWebService` XML Web service receives all SOAP headers, including ones other than the `MyHeader` SOAP header it knows about. `MyWebMethod`傳回給用戶端的最後一個未知 SOAP 標頭字串形式傳遞給它的 XML 屬性的 XML Web service 方法。The `MyWebMethod` XML Web service method returns to the client the XML attributes of the last unknown SOAP header passed to it as a string.
